## link() function

Given a text and an URL, generates a Markdown link

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function link(url: string, text?: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string | The URL to target |
|  text | string | The text to display |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

Markdown link

## Example 1

With a text:

```ts
link('https://github.com/bbenoist/node-tools', 'GitHub Repository');

```

## Example 2

Without a text:

```ts
link('https://npmjs.com/package/@bb-tools/markdown-magic-utils');

```
